contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, we're joined by Cyrus Summerlin, co-founder of the latest in food technology: "Push for Pizza"
teaser: How well have you kept up on this week's tech news?
title: Silicon Tally: Pizza pushers
description: How well have you kept up on this week's tech news?
